text: Follow Black Swan and leave the hotel in the Dreamscape

title: Mission Description
content: Black Swan tells you that you should evacuate as quickly as possible. But, as you are evacuating, you may be fortunate enough to find some traces left by Firefly that could help unravel the truth behind this sudden demise.Follow Black Swan to the Memory Zone's exit while investigating the murder scene.

text: (Take the elevator to the VIP floor)

speaker: Black Swan
line: ...What's going on? Why is it... getting hot in the memoria?

speaker: Acheron
line: You've noticed it too. Like something is burning...

speaker: Black Swan
line: These are all... charred remains?

speaker: Acheron
line: They're still smoldering — the culprit can't have gotten far.

speaker: Black Swan
line: I suppose we can slow down for now then...

title: Step Description
content: Black Swan tells you that you should evacuate as quickly as possible. But, as you are evacuating, you may be fortunate enough to find some traces left by Firefly that could help unravel the truth behind this sudden demise.You discovered a large number of charred remains during your evacuation. They are worth a thorough investigation.

speaker: Black Swan
line: They're all just *burning* Remembrances... a stark contrast to this deep sea.

speaker: Acheron
line: Careful, these traces are fresh. Our unsought guest isn't far away.

speaker: Black Swan
line: Not there. Come back.

text: The remains of this creature bears narrow and deep incisions, with evident traces of charring inflicted by intense burning. A few sparks dance and flicker within, resembling shattered stars departing towards IX .

speaker: (Trailblazer)
line: ▶ (Looks like this monster was slain by a thermic weapon...)

text: The remains of this creature, pierced by an unknown weapon, reveal inner tissues that have been seemingly evaporated rapidly due to intense heat. You cannot approach any closer — the steam escaping from the shattered body would undoubtedly scorch you.

speaker: (Trailblazer)
line: ▶ (Looks like this monster died of a hyperthermic reaction...)

text: The surface of this creature's remains appears unremarkable. Yet, as your hand grazes it, the searing heat transferred to your fingertips sends you jolting back, as if struck by an electric shock.
Without a doubt, a fierce inferno rages within the remains, desperately longing to break free from its confines. For the sake of your safety, it is best to keep your distance.

speaker: Acheron
line: Something's off. These traces are fresh. Someone just left the scene... Would this person have anything to do with what happened just now?

speaker: Black Swan
line: I cannot reach a conclusion with so few clues.

speaker: Acheron
line: Just listen to your gut — you were the one who said that... the Remembrance doesn't lie.

speaker: Black Swan
line: From the memories of these carcasses... that person was tall, and much stronger than an adult male. The method was clean and crisp, all one-strike kills — maybe a mercenary, or an assassin.

speaker: Black Swan
line: He entered through the door from the lobby, and went farther into the hotel. If that's the case... he should have seen everything that happened here...

speaker: Black Swan
line: ...I take back what I said. We have to hurry to that Memory Zone where Miss Firefly's presence was imprinted. Considering what this person can do...

speaker: Black Swan
line: If his goal is that place as well, there won't be anything left there.

text: Continue to follow Black Swan to leave the hotel in the Dreamscape

title: Step Description
content: Black Swan tells you that you should evacuate as quickly as possible. But, as you are evacuating, you may be fortunate enough to find some traces left by Firefly that could help unravel the truth behind this sudden demise.Black Swan believes that the situation may be even more serious than she imagined. You must hurry to the Memory Zone branded with traces of Firefly as quickly as possible.

speaker: Black Swan
line: You two, this way. I'll try to create a stable shortcut for you.

speaker: Black Swan
line: Look... Upon leaving the lobby, the structure has become chaotic. Phase through that corridor, and be careful — do not alert the meme.

speaker: Acheron
line: This is truly... a magnificent sight. It's this room, then?

speaker: Black Swan
line: Yes. More precisely, it's right below.

children.speaker: Black Swan
children.line: Exactly what it means: Down.

text: Doesn't look like there's a way down.

children.speaker: Black Swan
children.line: I wouldn't call it a shortcut if there was.

text: Are you going to teach me to phase through walls now?

speaker: Black Swan
line: You two may not be able to phase through physical structures like Memokeepers, but I've got a great idea that will let you safely reach the floor right below this room.

speaker: Black Swan
line: It's really easy — see this chandelier? Next... we want to create some reasonably *small movements*.

text: Find a way to shoot down the chandelier to clear a path

title: Step Description
content: Black Swan tells you that you should evacuate as quickly as possible. But, as you are evacuating, you may be fortunate enough to find some traces left by Firefly that could help unravel the truth behind this sudden demise.The Memory Zone keeps transforming. Sometimes, you may have to rely on certain tricks to find the true exit.

speaker: Black Swan
line: Still remember what I taught you? Feel the flow of the memoria, walk up the wall, and then... get close to it.

children.text: (OpenDreamwalker (IV) Tutorial)

speaker: Black Swan
line: Look, a solitary chain. Go say hello to it.

speaker: Black Swan
line: Look, it's common sense and easy, right?

speaker: Acheron
line: Are we... jumping down from here?

speaker: Black Swan
line: Don't worry, I'll do something about it. Let me stack the dream bubbles to give everyone a nice, soft landing.

speaker: Black Swan
line: Okay, here we go...

speaker: Acheron
line: We landed safely. This is... amazing.

speaker: Black Swan
line: Don't imitate the Memokeeper without the accompaniment of one! Well...

speaker: Black Swan
line: ...wouldn't it be lovely if these nosy newcomers found their way back home?

text: (Begin battle againstDreamjolt Troupe's Sweet Gorilla×1,Dreamjolt Troupe's Bubble Hound×2)

title: Step Description
content: Black Swan tells you that you should evacuate as quickly as possible. But, as you are evacuating, you may be fortunate enough to find some traces left by Firefly that could help unravel the truth behind this sudden demise.You finally reach the area that Black Swan was talking about. From there, the Memokeeper reproduces the memories related to Firefly — Let's hope that these traces can enlighten your thoughts.

speaker: Black Swan
line: No one will disturb us now. Here, how about I show you a little magic trick?

speaker: Black Swan
line: Not there. Come back.

speaker: Black Swan
line: Are you ready? Don't be too surprised.

speaker: Acheron
line: Is that... Firefly?

speaker: Black Swan
line: Yes. It's what this room left behind — the memories of her. The slight trembling of the ground, the fleeting reflections on the screen, the flow of memoria... I gathered and reproduced them in fragments.

speaker: Black Swan
line: As for the context... we'll need to sort that out a bit. Hurry along now. Recreating memories on this scale takes quite a toll on me.

speaker: Firefly
line: ▶ That thing I encountered with (Trailblazer) back then...

speaker: Firefly
line: If I'm not wrong... it has to do with the Watchmaker .

speaker: Acheron
line: She mentioned your name.

speaker: Black Swan
line: Thinking of you even in your absence, seems like you two were pretty close.

speaker: Black Swan
line: She seems to be sharing her discovery with someone, and... it's related to the Watchmaker.

speaker: Acheron
line: She has no idea that she'll become a victim...

text: Follow the Firefly in the memory

title: Step Description
content: Black Swan tells you that you should evacuate as quickly as possible. But, as you are evacuating, you may be fortunate enough to find some traces left by Firefly that could help unravel the truth behind this sudden demise.You finally reach the area that Black Swan was talking about. From there, the Memokeeper reproduces the memories related to Firefly — Try to iron out the truth behind this murder.

speaker: Firefly
line: If I could try again...

speaker: Acheron
line: She stares at the screens. Is she looking at herself in the mirror? ...What does she mean by "try again"?

speaker: Firefly
line: Let's get going...

speaker: Black Swan
line: "Let's"? Is there someone else?

speaker: Firefly
line: Calm down, Firefly... Stay calm...

speaker: Acheron
line: She seems... very nervous.

speaker: Black Swan
line: Yes. What is making her so nervous?

text: (After interacting with every Firefly in the room, optional)

speaker: Black Swan
line: With all this in mind, Firefly and her companion — there should only be one — have entered this corridor together.

speaker: Firefly
line: Why did you...!? This isn't what we agreed on...

speaker: Acheron
line: The situation has changed, and it seems that companion... has deviated from the original plan.

speaker: Black Swan
line: Perhaps, judging from the outcome... this is that person's true intention.

speaker: Firefly
line: Mecha...!? Why...

speaker: Acheron
line: Who forced her to go that way? And...

speaker: Black Swan
line: "Mecha"... What an intriguing statement. I recall the Bloodhound family is pursuing a criminal — "a tall male in silver armor."

speaker: Firefly
line: The door... It won't open... It's a dead end...

speaker: Acheron
line: Based on these fragmented pieces of information, it seems Firefly's companion betrayed her halfway and trapped her alone in this room, disappearing without a trace... But why?

speaker: Black Swan
line: She mentioned that this transaction involves the Watchmaker, and that often means stepping on many people's toes.

speaker: Black Swan
line: They might have had their eyes on the legacy, or wanted to silence another who knew too much. Or, there could be a deeper secret tucked away in this Memory Zone, and to hook that elusive prize... one needs the right bait.

speaker: Acheron
line: Do you mean... Firefly?

speaker: Black Swan
line: This is just the worst-case scenario. But think about it: If the mastermind behind all this is nearby, why would he let us look around freely? Unless...

speaker: Black Swan
line: ...there is something else he cares more about and needs — or should I say, is verifying.

speaker: Black Swan
line: She had no other way to leave but from the side corridor.

speaker: Firefly
line: There's actually a path here...

speaker: Black Swan
line: Unpredictable pathways pointing toward a wandering meme... She was completely lost in the Memory Zone.

speaker: Black Swan
line: Unpredictable pathways pointing toward a wandering meme... She was completely lost in the Memory Zone.

speaker: Firefly
line: It's an exit... Following this path should lead me out of this place...

speaker: Black Swan
line: Unfortunately, this path ultimately leads one to the lair of "Death."

speaker: Black Swan
line: Unfortunately, this path ultimately leads one to the lair of "Death."

speaker: Firefly
line: Finally back at the lobby. If that's the case...

speaker: Black Swan
line: She thought she had escaped but...

speaker: Black Swan
line: She thought she had escaped but...

speaker: Black Swan
line: After that, it's the end...

speaker: Acheron
line: Everyone, over there—

speaker: Black Swan
line: It seems like someone has been awaiting us. Ready to step into the spotlight now?

speaker: Black Swan
line: ... Stellaron Hunter : Sam .

children.speaker: Acheron
children.line: ...Careful.

children.speaker: Sam
children.line: A Galaxy Ranger ...

children.speaker: Sam
children.line: And... a Memokeeper

children.speaker: Sam
children.line: Leave now, and nobody gets hurt.

children.speaker: Sam
children.line: Or else...

children.speaker: Sam
children.line: All of you will die here.

children.speaker: Sam
children.line: The detective game is over. You shouldn't be here.

text: (Sam uses DHGDR Secondary Combustion for the first time)

children.speaker: Sam
children.line: I will... set the seas ablaze.

text: (Sam uses DHGDR Supernova Overload for the first time)

children.speaker: Sam
children.line: Once you're back in the real world, remember to tell everyone —

children.speaker: Sam
children.line: About the Stellaron Hunter who was behind your ultimate departure.

children.speaker: Sam
children.line: If that's the case—

children.text: (ObtainAchievementOld Friends, New Friends)

children.speaker: Black Swan
children.line: Leave the dance stage to them, my dear.

children.speaker: Aventurine
children.line: ...what a show.

speaker: Aventurine
line: Thank you for your efforts, Memokeeper - quite a brilliant move to pit enemies against each other.

speaker: Aventurine
line: When I first saw the Ranger and the Hunter together, my heart skipped a beat... I never thought you'd successfully trigger a conflict between the two.

speaker: Black Swan
line: As promised, I've delivered the child to you. Our transaction is complete.

text: You two are in this together...

speaker: Aventurine
line: Haha, looks like our Nameless friend over here is still confused. Let me explain.

speaker: Aventurine
line: In short, you need to thank this lady here, my friend. Not only did she not betray you — on the contrary, she rescued you...

speaker: Aventurine
line: ...from that "Galaxy Ranger."

speaker: Aventurine
line: Right, I do enjoy seeing that shocked expression of yours.

speaker: Aventurine
line: My friend, let's be honest. That woman named "Acheron" isn't as simple as you thought. Did she say she's a Galaxy Ranger?

speaker: Aventurine
line: ...She's actually an Emanator, who brings death and finality.

children.speaker: Aventurine
children.line: But? There's no but. This is the truth.

children.speaker: Aventurine
children.line: Perhaps The Hunt ... or Destruction ... or even Finality . It doesn't matter, these Paths all point to the same outcome.

text: Impossible. Why should I believe you?
No way. Acheron was right there at the scene. It couldn't have been her.

children.speaker: Aventurine
children.line: She was there? Wait, what... You're kidding... Oh my, this just got even more interesting.

speaker: Aventurine
line: Let me give you some IPC insider information, my friend. Do you know " Duke Inferno " — Fetora's Ifrit?

children.speaker: Aventurine
children.line: Nicely done, as expected! I'll cut to the chase then...

children.speaker: Aventurine
children.line: You don't seem to have heard of him before... He belongs to the Annihilation Gang , so I guess it's normal. Then let me explain to you...

speaker: Aventurine
line: This Duke Inferno is a Fire Demon from Fetora. He's an energy lifeform, and it's rumored that his birth is related to a certain genius ...

speaker: Aventurine
line: He and his thugs formed " Ever-Flame Mansion " and viewed Nanook as their savior — in actuality, they were led by this duke to go around burning and looting, practicing the will of Destruction. And even the other Annihilation Gangs weren't spared.

speaker: Aventurine
line: I'm not sure what The Family was thinking, or perhaps someone was scheming behind the scenes, but shockingly these characters received an invitation. And why would the Ever-Flame Mansion decline? They harbor fierce intentions, swearing to turn the Planet of Festivities into a sea of blazing flames...

speaker: Aventurine
line: But there's no need to worry. They won't be able to attend. Do you know why?

speaker: Aventurine
line: Because Ifrit is dead.

speaker: Aventurine
line: They were eliminated while on their way. The assailant, demonstrating remarkable expertise, ruthlessly ended Ifrit and swiped the invite that the Annihilation Gang had in their possession. The Ever-Flame Mansion disbanded, each going their separate ways...

speaker: Aventurine
line: Thereafter, a mysterious Galaxy Ranger arrived on Penacony, checking into the hotel with only a music box... Do you still need me to continue the story, my friend?

text: Do you have any other evidence?

speaker: Aventurine
line: The Galaxy Rangers come and go like shadows, and there's little communication between them. Her story is almost too perfect. If she remains silent, there's no concrete evidence against her. While the IPC can investigate, it'll take some time.

speaker: Aventurine
line: So, my friend, the choice is yours now... You can leave this place immediately, without looking back, and forever forsake the chance to get closer to the truth.

speaker: Aventurine
line: Or, you can accept my invitation and learn a truth , a truth potent enough to upend everything in Penacony.

speaker: Aventurine
line: I need your help, so I'll wait — but not for long. Once you are ready... follow me.

speaker: Aventurine
line: As for aligning with me, see the truth first, then decide... you'll still have time.

speaker: (Trailblazer)
line: ▶ (Acheron is the Emanator of a particular Aeon ? Can I really believe Aventurine...?)

speaker: (Trailblazer)
line: ▶ (But he gave me a choice... Maybe I should talk to Black Swan again.)

title: Step Description
content: As Acheron wages a ferocious battle against the Stellaron Hunter, Black Swan abducts you and takes you before Aventurine. Aventurine expresses his request to you, but you still cannot shake off your shock and the (to an extent) rage at being betrayed.Perhaps you should ask the Memokeeper just what she is planning.

text: (Approach door on the first floor, optional)

Aventurine isn't here. You know that, and so does he. You can also choose to turn around and find out what the facts are directly from his mouth, but if you insist on going forward, that signals a "rejection."

children.text: After careful consideration, you decline Aventurine's invitation. This time, he simply watches as you depart from the Memory Zone without asking you to stay.'
Returning to reality, you reunite with your companions. After a thorough discussion, the Crew decides to assist Penacony, leading to the revelation of a conspiracy orchestrated by the IPC.'

With the expulsion of all ill-intentioned visitors, the Charmony Festival proceeds smoothly. As honored guests, you partake in the joyous atmosphere, filled with laughter, clinking glasses full of SoulGlad, and the exuberant singing and dancing of the crowd...'
"May this moment last forever, and may we never awaken from this euphoric dream!"'
Honkai: Star Rail
Lead Actor (Trailblazer)
Starring ???  as  FIREFLY ???  as  ACHERON ???  as  BLACK SWAN ???  as  AVENTURINE
Starring ??? as  SAM ???  as MISHA ???  as GALLAGHER Sparkle  as  SPARKLE
Special Thanks Robin Sunday
Script Supervisor Elio
(Game restarts)

text: Let's go back and find Aventurine...

speaker: Black Swan
line: My, my... you look like a small injured animal. Are you still willing to talk to me? Of course... I'm still willing to be your psychotherapist.

children.speaker: Black Swan
children.line: I admit I'd made a transaction with that gentleman to bring you before him. But... this is also a safe place.

children.speaker: Black Swan
children.line: He needs you. It's essential if we want to reclaim Penacony. Recognizing his immense potential and the invaluable memories he can help me gather, I opted to join forces with him.

children.speaker: Black Swan
children.line: In Penacony, everyone may be lying, and yes... that includes me. I can't deny this, nor do I seek forgiveness.

children.speaker: Black Swan
children.line: But do you still remember? I said... "I have faith in your potential," and that's not a lie.

children.speaker: Black Swan
children.line: The Garden of Recollection wants to witness the future of the Astral Express Trailblazing the cosmos, and as for these memories — I will treasure them. I do not have reasons to hurt any of you. Instead, I will continue to assist you — provided you are willing to accept my assistance.

children.speaker: Black Swan
children.line: My take on this might surprise you.

children.speaker: Black Swan
children.line: In my view, he's a trustworthy individual. Not for any other reason, but because he's an exceptional businessman. In this vast universe, no one values honesty and contracts more than a merchant.

children.speaker: Black Swan
children.line: But, always be on guard, particularly when making agreements with him. Scrutinize the details. Beyond the confines of the contract, your rights are off his radar... He'll go to extreme lengths to ensure his advantage.

text: Who do you think is the mastermind...?

children.speaker: Black Swan
children.line: I still believe that Miss Firefly's situation... is deeply connected with the Stellaron Hunter, just as we speculated. But as you've heard, Aventurine has his finger pointed at the Galaxy Ranger.

children.speaker: Black Swan
children.line: I can't fathom why he'd draw that conclusion, but given his access to the IPC's intelligence network, we should seriously consider his perspective. Moreover, I believe Miss Acheron is also hiding something.

children.speaker: Black Swan
children.line: ...No, in fact, I should say, she's hiding everything from us.

children.speaker: Black Swan
children.line: It was an unexpected finding from an earlier encounter. With regards to the Annihilation Gang... I can also prove that what Aventurine said was the truth.

children.speaker: Black Swan
children.line: That's why, during this golden soirée... she is the dance's centerpiece.

text: Are you willing to bring me out of this Memory Zone?

speaker: Black Swan
line: Why of course, but now's not the time.

speaker: Black Swan
line: I know you're confused and... sad. Whoever that girl might have been, a living soul, a "memory" that was meant to last... she simply vanished, like the dissolution of bubbles in water, disappearing in an instant...

speaker: Black Swan
line: No matter what, I hope you can trust Aventurine — or rather — trust me and see the "truth" with your own eyes. This can lead us deeper into the secrets behind Penacony.

speaker: Black Swan
line: I will protect you. Once I gather more information from him, I'll make sure you're safely returned to your companions.

speaker: Black Swan
line: For the truth and to prevent more unnecessary sacrifices... It is the right choice.

text: How would I know you're not trying to frame me?

children.speaker: Black Swan
children.line: Perhaps he plans on doing so, but I won't.

children.speaker: Black Swan
children.line: The Garden of Recollection has eyes everywhere. If he wants to hurt you, he'll have to fight against the Memokeepers — I've warned him about that.

speaker: Black Swan
line: ▶ Later, I'll stay by your side as a memetic entity, just in case. Time to set off, (Trailblazer).

title: Step Description
content: The Memokeeper similarly expresses mistrust of Aventurine, but convinces you that it is for the greater good. You decide to go and see what this truth that he speaks of is — the truth that could "overturn Penacony."

speaker: (Trailblazer)
line: ▶ (Go and meet Aventurine, or... I could still choose not to help...)

text: (Approach door on the first floor, optional)

speaker: Black Swan
line: Are you still... continuing down this path? This is a rare opportunity. Leaving here... will also mean leaving the truth.

children.speaker: Black Swan
children.line: Yes, I [ sic ] better think about Aventurine's proposal.

text: I've decided. I'm leaving this place.

speaker: Black Swan
line: I see... Fine, I respect your choice. Let's return to reality.

children.text: After careful consideration, you decline Aventurine's invitation. This time, he simply watches as you depart from the Memory Zone without asking you to stay.
Returning to reality, you reunite with your companions. After a thorough discussion, the Crew decides to assist Penacony, leading to the revelation of a conspiracy orchestrated by the IPC.

With the expulsion of all ill-intentioned visitors, the Charmony Festival proceeds smoothly. As honored guests, you partake in the joyous atmosphere, filled with laughter, clinking glasses full of SoulGlad, and the exuberant singing and dancing of the crowd...
"May this moment last forever, and may we never awaken from this euphoric dream!"
Honkai: Star Rail
Lead Actor (Trailblazer)
Starring ???  as  FIREFLY ???  as  ACHERON ???  as  BLACK SWAN ???  as  AVENTURINE
Starring ???  as  SAM ???  as  MISHA ???  as  GALLAGHER Sparkle  as  SPARKLE
Special Thanks Robin Sunday
Script Supervisor Elio
(Game restarts)

speaker: Aventurine
line: Excellent, I knew you would come. By the way, about that Memokeeper... Never mind, I won't press the issue further.

speaker: Aventurine
line: I've said before, you can liaise with your companions, or even twist the narrative against me. I'll wholeheartedly embrace it! It signifies your potential.

speaker: Aventurine
line: I don't do deals where I'm on the losing end. So, my "friends"... don't let me down.

speaker: Aventurine
line: Please, this way if you will!

title: Step Description
content: The "truth that could overturn Penacony" is just ahead... Good luck.

speaker: Aventurine
line: Oh right, I remember mentioning something after that... What was it again?

speaker: Aventurine
line: Ah... a familiar hallway, a familiar room. Do you remember? The last time we met was right here.

speaker: Aventurine
line: This is it, just beyond this door. Take a deep breath and get ready.

speaker: Aventurine
line: Oh, I remember... my friend! After that, we played an enjoyable game.

speaker: Aventurine
line: Tell me, doesn't this feel eerily familiar?

speaker: Aventurine
line: I remember everything now. This was what I told you at that time...

children.speaker: Aventurine
children.line: Look, friend.

children.speaker: Aventurine
children.line: The game has already begun.

children.speaker: Aventurine
children.line: Allow me to make you an offer — one you can't refuse.

children.speaker: Aventurine
children.line: No reason to choose otherwise...

children.speaker: Aventurine
children.line: ...and no other choices.

line: Brother, I'm back.

speaker: Sunday
line: ...Welcome back. How's your preparation for the performance coming?
It's fine. Don't worry.

speaker: Sunday
line: "It's fine"?

speaker: Sunday
line: Hmm, this is not good... You're the pride of The Family. Don't let those unnecessary emotions affect your perfect pitch.
I... know.
Brother, you seem to be in low spirit... What's happened? Is it because of the Watchmaker's guest list?

speaker: Sunday
line: Yes, I received the report that... "Death" had taken some of them. Perhaps someone was behind it.

speaker: Sunday
line: Ah, I'm sorry. I forgot you just came back. You probably wouldn't know about it.

speaker: Sunday
line: Somehow, a nightmare called "Death" has descended upon Penacony, striking indiscriminately, bringing spiritual death to all equally...

speaker: Sunday
line: In the utopian dreamscape envisioned by The Family, such sorrowful incidents shouldn't arise. It profoundly undermines the equilibrium and serenity of the dreamscape... How detestable.
I can't believe this has happened. Was... someone killed again?

speaker: Sunday
line: Yes. There were two. One was a stowaway, the other...

speaker: Sunday
line: ...was you.

speaker: Sunday
line: That's enough Fool . Your deeds have saddened me.

speaker: Sparkle
line: Pretty sharp, aren't you, Chicken Wing Boy?

speaker: Sunday
line: The Odes of Harmony talks about honesty — "The words of a fool begins with foolishness and end in treacherous arrogance"...

speaker: Sunday
line: ...Please leave. THEIR dreamscape doesn't welcome you.

speaker: Sparkle
line: Oh come on, lighten up! Why so serious with all the quotations and references?

speaker: Sparkle
line: I'm just curious — Now things have come to this, is The Family still unwilling to fight? I mean, your darling sister's already a goner, right?

speaker: Sparkle
line: Really? Don't tell me you're not craving a little vengeance.

speaker: Sunday
line: It's not yet time. When the fated day arrives, I shall mete out justice with unyielding righteousness.

speaker: Sparkle
line: Wow, you can endure that much? Truly, a heart of ice you've got there. Hey, maybe we could actually get along?

speaker: Sparkle
line: How about this? I'll stand in for your dear sister at events — surely you don't want the world to hear the Charmony Festival's been called off?

speaker: Sunday
line: The Family has a plan, and do not dishonor my dear sister with your deceitful tongue again, Fool.

speaker: Sparkle
line: Alright, alright~ Just putting it out there... If you're ever in a pinch, remember I've got your back. I mean, who could resist a guy rocking spikes on his wings?

speaker: Sunday
line: There's no need. The malefactor has been exposed under THEIR radiant gaze and will soon fall by their own machinations.

speaker: Sunday
line: Should the transgressor fail to turn away from this path, THEIR sword will be honed, THEIR bow strung, causing the malevolence the perpetrator spreads to befall them.

speaker: Sunday
line: When that time comes, the heathen will realize they are but a mere mortal, doomed to descend into the netherworld.

speaker: Sunday
line: ...And I will join THEIR vanguard to announce this good news to you personally, "Watchmaker."

children.text:
(ObtainDestiny's Threads Forewoven×1,Nevermore×1)
(ObtainAchievementIf I Can Stop One Heart From Breaking)
